meanings.sent1: She remained unembittered despite facing many challenges.
meanings.sent2: The unembittered child forgave his friend for breaking his toy.
meanings.sent3: The unembittered puppy wagged its tail happily even after being scolded.
meanings.sent4: Her unembittered heart shone brightly with kindness towards others.
meanings.sent5: The unembittered garden bloomed with vibrant colors and fragrances.

meanings.sent1: The unembittered old man always had a smile on his face.
meanings.sent2: She approached the situation with an unembittered attitude.
meanings.sent3: The unembittered river flowed peacefully through the valley.
meanings.sent4: His unembittered spirit lifted the mood of everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The unembittered sky was painted with a beautiful sunset.
